title: Crocin nano-chitosan-coated compound mitigates hippocampal blood-brain barrier disruption, anxiety, and cognitive deficits in chronic immobilization stress-induced rats
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Mohsen Khodadadi, Gila Pirzad Jahromi, Gholam Hossein Meftahi, Hossein Khodadadi, Mohammadmehdi Hadipour, Masoud Ezami
